SELECT SG.ID ID, SG.NAME NAME, SG.TOTAL_COUNT TOTALCOUNT, SG.CURRENT_COUNT CURRENTCOUNT, SG.REGDATE REGDATE, SG.IMAGE_PATH IMAGEPATH, SG.SUBJECT SUBJECT, SGG.NAME SIGUNGUNAME, M.NAME MEMBERNAME FROM STUDY_GROUP SG JOIN GROUP_MEMBER_LIST GML ON SG.ID = GML.STUDY_GROUP_ID JOIN SI_GUN_GU SGG ON SG.SI_GUN_GU_ID = SGG.ID JOIN MEMBER M ON M.ID = GML.MEMBER_ID WHERE SG.ID = #{id} AND GML.POSITION = '팀장' AND SG.STATUS = 'enabled'
